415  namespace details {
416 
417  // Helper traits to distinguish work arrays for real and complex-valued datatypes.
418  template<typename T>
419  struct lapack_traits {
420  typedef int iwork_type;
421  };
422 
423  // Complex-valued specialization
424  template<typename T>
425  struct lapack_traits<std::complex<T> > {
426  typedef typename ScalarTraits<T>::magnitudeType iwork_type;
427  };
428 
429  } // end namespace details

433 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
434 SerialDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::SerialDenseSolver()
435  : CompObject(),
436  Object("Teuchos::SerialDenseSolver"),
437  equilibrate_(false),
438  shouldEquilibrate_(false),
439  equilibratedA_(false),
440  equilibratedB_(false),
441  transpose_(false),
442  factored_(false),
443  estimateSolutionErrors_(false),
444  solutionErrorsEstimated_(false),
445  solved_(false),
446  inverted_(false),
447  reciprocalConditionEstimated_(false),
448  refineSolution_(false),
449  solutionRefined_(false),
450  TRANS_(Teuchos::NO_TRANS),
451  M_(0),
452  N_(0),
453  Min_MN_(0),
454  LDA_(0),
455  LDAF_(0),
456  INFO_(0),
457  LWORK_(0),
458  ANORM_(ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::zero()),
459  RCOND_(ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::zero()),
460  ROWCND_(ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::zero()),
461  COLCND_(ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::zero()),
462  AMAX_(ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::zero()),
463  A_(0),
464  AF_(0)
465 {
466  resetMatrix();
467 }

471 SerialDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::~SerialDenseSolver()
472 {}

476 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
477 void SerialDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::resetVectors()
478 {
479  LHS_ = Teuchos::null;
480  RHS_ = Teuchos::null;
481  reciprocalConditionEstimated_ = false;
482  solutionRefined_ = false;
483  solved_ = false;
484  solutionErrorsEstimated_ = false;
485  equilibratedB_ = false;
486 }
487 //=============================================================================
488 
489 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
490 void SerialDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::resetMatrix()
491 {
492  resetVectors();
493  equilibratedA_ = false;
494  factored_ = false;
495  inverted_ = false;
496  M_ = 0;
497  N_ = 0;
498  Min_MN_ = 0;
499  LDA_ = 0;
500  LDAF_ = 0;
501  ANORM_ = -ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::one();
502  RCOND_ = -ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::one();
503  ROWCND_ = -ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::one();
504  COLCND_ = -ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::one();
505  AMAX_ = -ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::one();
506  A_ = 0;
507  AF_ = 0;
508  INFO_ = 0;
509  LWORK_ = 0;
510  R_.resize(0);
511  C_.resize(0);
512 }
513 //=============================================================================
514 
515 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
516 int SerialDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::setMatrix(const RCP<SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType,ScalarType> >& A)
517 {
518  resetMatrix();
519  Matrix_ = A;
520  Factor_ = A;
521  M_ = A->numRows();
522  N_ = A->numCols();
523  Min_MN_ = TEUCHOS_MIN(M_,N_);
524  LDA_ = A->stride();
525  LDAF_ = LDA_;
526  A_ = A->values();
527  AF_ = A->values();
528  return(0);
529 }
530 //=============================================================================
531 
532 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
533 int SerialDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::setVectors(const RCP<SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType,ScalarType> >& X,
534  const RCP<SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType,ScalarType> >& B)
535 {
536  // Check that these new vectors are consistent.
537  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(B->numRows()!=X->numRows() || B->numCols() != X->numCols(), std::invalid_argument,
538  "SerialDenseSolver<T>::setVectors: X and B are not the same size!");
539  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(B->values()==0, std::invalid_argument,
540  "SerialDenseSolver<T>::setVectors: B is an empty SerialDenseMatrix<T>!");
541  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(X->values()==0, std::invalid_argument,
542  "SerialDenseSolver<T>::setVectors: X is an empty SerialDenseMatrix<T>!");
543  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(B->stride()<1, std::invalid_argument,
544  "SerialDenseSolver<T>::setVectors: B has an invalid stride!");
545  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(X->stride()<1, std::invalid_argument,
546  "SerialDenseSolver<T>::setVectors: X has an invalid stride!");
547 
548  resetVectors();
549  LHS_ = X;
550  RHS_ = B;
551  return(0);
552 }
553 //=============================================================================
554 
555 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
556 void SerialDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::estimateSolutionErrors(bool flag)
557 {
558  estimateSolutionErrors_ = flag;
559 
560  // If the errors are estimated, this implies that the solution must be refined
561  refineSolution_ = refineSolution_ || flag;
562 }
563 //=============================================================================
564 
565 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
566 int SerialDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::factor() {
567 
568  if (factored()) return(0); // Already factored
569 
570  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(inverted(), std::logic_error,
571  "SerialDenseSolver<T>::factor: Cannot factor an inverted matrix!");
572 
573  ANORM_ = Matrix_->normOne(); // Compute 1-Norm of A
574 
575 
576  // If we want to refine the solution, then the factor must
577  // be stored separatedly from the original matrix
578 
579  if (A_ == AF_)
580  if (refineSolution_ ) {
581  Factor_ = rcp( new SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType,ScalarType>(*Matrix_) );
582  AF_ = Factor_->values();
583  LDAF_ = Factor_->stride();
584  }
585 
586  int ierr = 0;
587  if (equilibrate_) ierr = equilibrateMatrix();
588 
589  if (ierr!=0) return(ierr);
590 
591  if ((int)IPIV_.size()!=Min_MN_) IPIV_.resize( Min_MN_ ); // Allocated Pivot vector if not already done.
592 
593  INFO_ = 0;
594  this->GETRF(M_, N_, AF_, LDAF_, &IPIV_[0], &INFO_);
595  factored_ = true;
596 
597  return(INFO_);
598 }
599 
600 //=============================================================================
601 
602 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
603 int SerialDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::solve() {
604 
605  // We will call one of four routines depending on what services the user wants and
606  // whether or not the matrix has been inverted or factored already.
607  //
608  // If the matrix has been inverted, use DGEMM to compute solution.
609  // Otherwise, if the user want the matrix to be equilibrated or wants a refined solution, we will
610  // call the X interface.
611  // Otherwise, if the matrix is already factored we will call the TRS interface.
612  // Otherwise, if the matrix is unfactored we will call the SV interface.
613 
614  int ierr = 0;
615  if (equilibrate_) {
616  ierr = equilibrateRHS();
617  equilibratedB_ = true;
618  }
619  if (ierr != 0) return(ierr); // Can't equilibrate B, so return.
620 
621  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION( (equilibratedA_ && !equilibratedB_) || (!equilibratedA_ && equilibratedB_) ,
622  std::logic_error, "SerialDenseSolver<T>::solve: Matrix and vectors must be similarly scaled!");
623  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION( RHS_==Teuchos::null, std::invalid_argument,
624  "SerialDenseSolver<T>::solve: No right-hand side vector (RHS) has been set for the linear system!");
625  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION( LHS_==Teuchos::null, std::invalid_argument,
626  "SerialDenseSolver<T>::solve: No solution vector (LHS) has been set for the linear system!");
627 
628  if (shouldEquilibrate() && !equilibratedA_)
629  std::cout << "WARNING! SerialDenseSolver<T>::solve: System should be equilibrated!" << std::endl;
630 
631  if (inverted()) {
632 
633  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION( RHS_->values() == LHS_->values(), std::invalid_argument,
634  "SerialDenseSolver<T>::solve: X and B must be different vectors if matrix is inverted.");
635 
636  INFO_ = 0;
637  this->GEMM(TRANS_, Teuchos::NO_TRANS, N_, RHS_->numCols(), N_, 1.0, AF_, LDAF_,
638  RHS_->values(), RHS_->stride(), 0.0, LHS_->values(), LHS_->stride());
639  if (INFO_!=0) return(INFO_);
640  solved_ = true;
641  }
642  else {
643 
644  if (!factored()) factor(); // Matrix must be factored
645 
646  if (RHS_->values()!=LHS_->values()) {
647  (*LHS_) = (*RHS_); // Copy B to X if needed
648  }
649  INFO_ = 0;
650  this->GETRS(ETranspChar[TRANS_], N_, RHS_->numCols(), AF_, LDAF_, &IPIV_[0], LHS_->values(), LHS_->stride(), &INFO_);
651  if (INFO_!=0) return(INFO_);
652  solved_ = true;
653 
654  }
655  int ierr1=0;
656  if (refineSolution_ && !inverted()) ierr1 = applyRefinement();
657  if (ierr1!=0)
658  return(ierr1);
659 
660  if (equilibrate_) ierr1 = unequilibrateLHS();
661  return(ierr1);
662 }
663 //=============================================================================
664 
665 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
666 int SerialDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::applyRefinement()
667 {
668  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(!solved(), std::logic_error,
669  "SerialDenseSolver<T>::applyRefinement: Must have an existing solution!");
670  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(A_==AF_, std::logic_error,
671  "SerialDenseSolver<T>::applyRefinement: Cannot apply refinement if no original copy of A!");
672 
673  OrdinalType NRHS = RHS_->numCols();
674  FERR_.resize( NRHS );
675  BERR_.resize( NRHS );
676  allocateWORK();
677 
678  INFO_ = 0;
679  std::vector<typename details::lapack_traits<ScalarType>::iwork_type> GERFS_WORK( N_ );
680  this->GERFS(ETranspChar[TRANS_], N_, NRHS, A_, LDA_, AF_, LDAF_, &IPIV_[0],
681  RHS_->values(), RHS_->stride(), LHS_->values(), LHS_->stride(),
682  &FERR_[0], &BERR_[0], &WORK_[0], &GERFS_WORK[0], &INFO_);
683 
684  solutionErrorsEstimated_ = true;
685  reciprocalConditionEstimated_ = true;
686  solutionRefined_ = true;
687 
688  return(INFO_);
689 
690 }
691 
692 //=============================================================================
693 
694 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
695 int SerialDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::computeEquilibrateScaling()
696 {
697  if (R_.size()!=0) return(0); // Already computed
698 
699  R_.resize( M_ );
700  C_.resize( N_ );
701 
702  INFO_ = 0;
703  this->GEEQU (M_, N_, AF_, LDAF_, &R_[0], &C_[0], &ROWCND_, &COLCND_, &AMAX_, &INFO_);
704 
705  if (COLCND_<0.1*ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::one() ||
706  ROWCND_<0.1*ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::one() ||
707  AMAX_ < ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::rmin() || AMAX_ > ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::rmax() )
708  shouldEquilibrate_ = true;
709 
710  return(INFO_);
711 }
712 
713 //=============================================================================
714 
715 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
716 int SerialDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::equilibrateMatrix()
717 {
718  OrdinalType i, j;
719  int ierr = 0;
720 
721  if (equilibratedA_) return(0); // Already done.
722  if (R_.size()==0) ierr = computeEquilibrateScaling(); // Compute R and C if needed.
723  if (ierr!=0) return(ierr); // If return value is not zero, then can't equilibrate.
724  if (A_==AF_) {
725  ScalarType * ptr;
726  for (j=0; j<N_; j++) {
727  ptr = A_ + j*LDA_;
728  ScalarType s1 = C_[j];
729  for (i=0; i<M_; i++) {
730  *ptr = *ptr*s1*R_[i];
731  ptr++;
732  }
733  }
734  }
735  else {
736  ScalarType * ptr;
737  ScalarType * ptr1;
738  for (j=0; j<N_; j++) {
739  ptr = A_ + j*LDA_;
740  ptr1 = AF_ + j*LDAF_;
741  ScalarType s1 = C_[j];
742  for (i=0; i<M_; i++) {
743  *ptr = *ptr*s1*R_[i];
744  ptr++;
745  *ptr1 = *ptr1*s1*R_[i];
746  ptr1++;
747  }
748  }
749  }
750 
751  equilibratedA_ = true;
752 
753  return(0);
754 }
755 
756 //=============================================================================
757 
758 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
759 int SerialDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::equilibrateRHS()
760 {
761  OrdinalType i, j;
762  int ierr = 0;
763 
764  if (equilibratedB_) return(0); // Already done.
765  if (R_.size()==0) ierr = computeEquilibrateScaling(); // Compute R and C if needed.
766  if (ierr!=0) return(ierr); // Can't count on R and C being computed.
767 
768  MagnitudeType * R_tmp = &R_[0];
769  if (transpose_) R_tmp = &C_[0];
770 
771  OrdinalType LDB = RHS_->stride(), NRHS = RHS_->numCols();
772  ScalarType * B = RHS_->values();
773  ScalarType * ptr;
774  for (j=0; j<NRHS; j++) {
775  ptr = B + j*LDB;
776  for (i=0; i<M_; i++) {
777  *ptr = *ptr*R_tmp[i];
778  ptr++;
779  }
780  }
781 
782  equilibratedB_ = true;
783 
784  return(0);
785 }
786 
787 //=============================================================================
788 
789 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
790 int SerialDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::unequilibrateLHS()
791 {
792  OrdinalType i, j;
793 
794  if (!equilibratedB_) return(0); // Nothing to do
795 
796  MagnitudeType * C_tmp = &C_[0];
797  if (transpose_) C_tmp = &R_[0];
798 
799  OrdinalType LDX = LHS_->stride(), NLHS = LHS_->numCols();
800  ScalarType * X = LHS_->values();
801  ScalarType * ptr;
802  for (j=0; j<NLHS; j++) {
803  ptr = X + j*LDX;
804  for (i=0; i<N_; i++) {
805  *ptr = *ptr*C_tmp[i];
806  ptr++;
807  }
808  }
809 
810  return(0);
811 }
812 
813 //=============================================================================
814 
815 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
816 int SerialDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::invert()
817 {
818  if (!factored()) factor(); // Need matrix factored.
819 
820  /* This section work with LAPACK Version 3.0 only
821  // Setting LWORK = -1 and calling GETRI will return optimal work space size in WORK_TMP
822  OrdinalType LWORK_TMP = -1;
823  ScalarType WORK_TMP;
824  GETRI( N_, AF_, LDAF_, &IPIV_[0], &WORK_TMP, &LWORK_TMP, &INFO_);
825  LWORK_TMP = WORK_TMP; // Convert to integer
826  if (LWORK_TMP>LWORK_) {
827  LWORK_ = LWORK_TMP;
828  WORK_.resize( LWORK_ );
829  }
830  */
831  // This section will work with any version of LAPACK
832  allocateWORK();
833 
834  INFO_ = 0;
835  this->GETRI( N_, AF_, LDAF_, &IPIV_[0], &WORK_[0], LWORK_, &INFO_);
836 
837  inverted_ = true;
838  factored_ = false;
839 
840  return(INFO_);
841 }
842 
843 //=============================================================================
844 
845 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
846 int SerialDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::reciprocalConditionEstimate(MagnitudeType & Value)
847 {
848  if (reciprocalConditionEstimated()) {
849  Value = RCOND_;
850  return(0); // Already computed, just return it.
851  }
852 
853  if ( ANORM_<ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::zero() ) ANORM_ = Matrix_->normOne();
854 
855  int ierr = 0;
856  if (!factored()) ierr = factor(); // Need matrix factored.
857  if (ierr!=0) return(ierr);
858 
859  allocateWORK();
860 
861  // We will assume a one-norm condition number
862  INFO_ = 0;
863  std::vector<typename details::lapack_traits<ScalarType>::iwork_type> GECON_WORK( 2*N_ );
864  this->GECON( '1', N_, AF_, LDAF_, ANORM_, &RCOND_, &WORK_[0], &GECON_WORK[0], &INFO_);
865 
866  reciprocalConditionEstimated_ = true;
867  Value = RCOND_;
868 
869  return(INFO_);
870 }
871 //=============================================================================
872 
873 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
874 void SerialDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::Print(std::ostream& os) const {
875 
876  if (Matrix_!=Teuchos::null) os << "Solver Matrix" << std::endl << *Matrix_ << std::endl;
877  if (Factor_!=Teuchos::null) os << "Solver Factored Matrix" << std::endl << *Factor_ << std::endl;
878  if (LHS_ !=Teuchos::null) os << "Solver LHS" << std::endl << *LHS_ << std::endl;
879  if (RHS_ !=Teuchos::null) os << "Solver RHS" << std::endl << *RHS_ << std::endl;
880 
881 }
882 
883 } // namespace Teuchos
884 
885 #endif /* _TEUCHOS_SERIALDENSESOLVER_HPP_ */
